findings.title: recover() function doesn’t adequately ensure the withdrawable amount of tokens
findings.description: The recover() function allows the owner to pass any ERC20 token address to recover the withdrawable token for the given address but lacks adequate checks to ensure that the total withdrawable amount is more than zero, leading to potential gas loss.

findings.title: No Events are emitted after updating the maxLiquidityPercentageSwap variable
findings.description: The setMaxLiquidityPercentageSwap() function updates the maxLiquidityPercentageSwap state variable but doesn't emit any event after the modification.

findings.title: Absence of input validation in the setcollectInterestGasCostParams() function
findings.description: The setcollectInterestGasCostParams() function doesn’t include any input validation on the uint32 arguments being passed to the function.

findings.title: No Events emitted after imperative State Variable modification
findings.description: Functions that update an imperative arithmetic state variable contract should emit an event after the state modification.
